text: Alen Avdić (born 3 April 1977) is a Bosnia and Herzegovinan football player. He has played for the Bosnia and Herzegovina national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Division Apps Goals Sarajevo 1995–96 Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina 0 0 1996–97 0 0 1997–98 0 0 Total 0 0 Sakaryaspor 1998–99 1.Lig 2 0 Cercle Brugge 1998–99 Second Division 19 3 Sarajevo 1999–2000 Premier League of Bosnia and Herzegovina 0 0 Chemnitzer FC 2000–01 2.
